about_the_game:
Your Workers have formed the National Union of Dungeon Excavators. Their leader, The Cynical Imp, is unhappy to say the least about your slap-heavy working conditions and uncharitable procedures. He’s come out of retirement to head this campaign and is threatening an all-out strike unless you agree to his terms.



To download The Cynical Imp skin simply select your bundle. Larger donations will also grant access to the previously-exclusive Kickstarter and Founders Dungeon Themes!



The Cynical Imp will then hit the campaign trail across all non-Campaign game modes!

100% of all Brightrock Games proceeds will be donated to charity as part of the GamesAid Digital for Good initiative.

GamesAid is registered charity no. 1081706.
detailed_description:
GamesAid Digital for Good

100% of all Brightrock Games proceeds will be donated to charity as part of the GamesAid Digital for Good initiative.


About the Game

Your Workers have formed the National Union of Dungeon Excavators. Their leader, The Cynical Imp, is unhappy to say the least about your slap-heavy working conditions and uncharitable procedures. He’s come out of retirement to head this campaign and is threatening an all-out strike unless you agree to his terms.



To download The Cynical Imp skin simply select your bundle. Larger donations will also grant access to the previously-exclusive Kickstarter and Founders Dungeon Themes!



The Cynical Imp will then hit the campaign trail across all non-Campaign game modes!

100% of all Brightrock Games proceeds will be donated to charity as part of the GamesAid Digital for Good initiative.

GamesAid is registered charity no. 1081706.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT450 512MB or better, ATI 4870HD 512MB or better
  • G3D Mark: 1500
  • Hard Drive: 7GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
  • Additional Linux Requirements:
    • glibc 2.14 or later
    • libstdc++6 or later
    • GCC 4.9 or later
    • Only the latest video card drivers are supported
    • OpenGL 3.0 support is required

Full Knowledgebase Article
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 1GB or better, Radeon 8950 HD 1GB or better
  • G3D Mark: 3000
  • Hard Drive: 10GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones
  • Additional Linux Requirements:
    • glibc 2.14 or later
    • libstdc++6 or later
    • GCC 4.9 or later
    • Only the latest video card drivers are supported
    • OpenGL 3.0 support is required

Full Knowledgebase Article

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT450 512MB or better, ATI 4870HD 512MB or better
  • G3D Mark: 1500
  • Hard Drive: 7GB available space
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones

Full Knowledgebase Article

Due to compatibility issues, 2017 Macbook Pros and onwards which feature Intel Iris graphics are not supported. For more information please view our full article above.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 series with 1GB RAM or better, Radeon 8950 HD with 1GB RAM or better
  • G3D Mark: 3000
  • Hard Drive: 10GB available space (may increase in the future)
  • Sound: Speakers or headphones

Full Knowledgebase Article

Due to compatibility issues, 2017 Macbook Pros and onwards which feature Intel Iris graphics are not supported. For more information please view our full article above.

pegi.descriptors: Fantasy Violence, Bad Language, Online Content

short_description: Leading a Workers’ union against your despicable carry on, The Cynical Imp is coming out of retirement. Are you feeling charitable? 100% of all Brightrock Games proceeds will be donated to charity as part of the GamesAid Digital for Good initiative.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
